players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Be cautious, Diana has been identified as the mafioso. Keep an eye on her actions."
Diana: "Be careful, Alice. I'm the mafioso and I know who you are now."
You: "I'm confused, I didn't reveal anything about myself last night. Can someone explain what's going on?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
